contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Broadcast | call_letters = XHCDE-TV| station_logo = [[File:XHGC_2013.png|100px]]| station_branding = Canal 5| station_slogan = Televisión como tú quieres<br>''(TV the way you like it)''| analog = 13 ([[VHF]])| digital = 44 ([[UHF]]) '''Future'''<ref>http://www.cft.gob.mx/images/Transicion_de_canales_digitales_publicar_Internet_201209.pdf</ref>| subchannels = | affiliations = [[Canal 5 (Televisa Network)|Canal 5]]| founded = | location = [[Delicias, Chihuahua]]| callsign_meaning = '''C'''iudad '''DE'''licias| owner = [[Televisa]]| licensee = Televimex| effective_radiated_power = [[Analog television|Analog]]: 22 kW| homepage = [http://www.televisa.com/canal5 Canal 5]| }} '''XHCDE''' is the [[television call sign]] for the [[Televisa]] [[owned-and-operated]] [[television station]] broadcasting on channel 13 in [[Delicias, Chihuahua]], [[Mexico]]. The station is an affiliate of the [[Canal 5 (Televisa Network)|Canal 5]] network. It also broadcasts local programming and news, and is the default [[Canal 5 (Televisa Network)|Canal 5]]-affiliate in [[Camargo, Chihuahua]].<ref>[http://www.cofetel.gob.mx/es/Cofetel_2008/Cofe_infraestructura Comision Federal de Comunicaciones: Telecommunication Infrastructure in Mexico] {{es}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.televisa.com/canal5/ Canal 5 (Televisa Network) Website] {{es}} {{Ciudad Delicias TV}} {{Camargo TV}} {{Canal 5 (Televisa Network) Chihuahua}} {{Televisa Chihuahua}} {{Borderland Televisa O-O stations}} [[Category:Canal 5 (Televisa Network) affiliates]] [[Category:Channel 13 TV stations in Mexico]] [[Category:Spanish-language television stations in Mexico]] [[Category:Television stations in Chihuahua]] [[Category:Media in Delicias, Chihuahua]] {{Mexico-tv-station-stub}}
